RelatedSentence: - The city of Yakima is likely to expand its anti-panhandling ordinance to more of the city 's intersections Tuesday .
That intersection and others are on a new list where city officials hope to effectively ban panhandling .

That would effectively expand the ban on panhandling from 15 to 26 intersections in the city .
The ordinance does not restrict a person on a street corner from holding a sign or distributing items , such as political campaign literature , to someone in a car .
The city also outlaws panhandlers from intimidating , touching or pursuing people , as well as begging in parking lots .
Last year the city also upgraded penalties for aggressive language or touching from citations to misdemeanors .
